title: Self-Actualization vs. Self-Image Actualization
description: Bruce Lee on the difference between Self-Actualization and Self-Image Actualization. Most people pursue only the first and never find their true selves.

title: The Wim Hof Method
description: Sketchnote of the Wim Hof Method. A breathing technique, which allowed him to hold 26 world records of the extreme kind: Walking on Mount Everest in shorts, buried in ice for hours.
